item.title: agentskillsagentskills Agent Skills çš„è§„èŒƒå’Œæ–‡æ¡£ --- agentskillsagentskills Specification and documentation for Agent Skills --çŸ¥è¯†é“º
item.description: Agent Skills Agent Skills are a simple, open format for giving agents new capabilities and expertise. Skills are folders of instructions, scripts, and resources that agents can discover and use to perform better at specific tasks. Write once, use everywhere. Getting Started Documentation - Guides and tutorials Specification - Format details Example Skills - See what’s possible This repo contains the specification, documentation, and reference SDK. Also see a list of example skills here. About Agent Skills is an open format maintained by Anthropic and open to contributions from the community.

item.description: Bloomberg/Contributor/Bloomberg via Getty Images Follow ZDNET: Add us as a preferred source on Google. ZDNET’s key takeaways Anthropic has launched a new Microsoft 365 connector for Claude. The company has also debuted a new “enterprise search” feature. Use Claude to search company documents and files. The AI integrations keep coming: You can now chat with Anthropic’s Claude AI chatbot directly in Microsoft 365. Also: This new Copilot trick will save you tons of time in Windows 11 - here’s how Through a new Microsoft 365 connector, Claude can access SharePoint, OneDrive, Outlook, and Teams to pull information directly from those apps. The idea – which has been rapidly spreading among leading AI developers – is to embed Anthropic’s flagship AI chatbot directly into the digital tools that millions of working people already use on a daily basis.
